column4: Hey all, im currently running a fedora core 4 installation... and i wish to switch to ubuntu breezy but installing it on my server box didnt goto well and im not sure whethere i should make the switch the installtion seemed to get stuck retreiving packages at 6% has anyone had any similar problems or know if its been fixed?
Ithink it's the CD's foult. Try again (and hope)
i had burnt 3 cd's off and all had the same problem
